verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, that is over <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> him all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, unto <S%H1835>Dan<s%>,

and all <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the <S%H314>hinder<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>,
and the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and the <S%H3603>Plain<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palm-trees<s%>, unto <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H776>him<s%>, This is the land which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>: I have caused thee to <S%H7200>see<s%> it with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, but thou shalt not go over <S%H5674>thither<s%>.

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Beth-peor<s%>: but no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> of his <S%H6900>sepulchre<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died<s%>: his <S%H5869>eye<s%> was not <S%H3543>dim<s%>, nor his natural <S%H3893>force<s%> <S%H5127>abated<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: so the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> in the <S%H60>mourning<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> were <S%H8552>ended<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5564>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon <S%H1121>him<s%>: and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H6213>him<s%>, and did as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And there hath not <S%H6965>arisen<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5750>since<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>,

in all the <S%H226>signs<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and to all his <S%H776>land<s%>,

and in all the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and in all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
